stories.text:
In the past few weeks, nocodefounders.com has received support and resources to help take the community to the next level. This is allowing us to do some big things. Firstly, I’m going full-time with NCF this year. I have left my full-time job in tech and I’m now putting 100% of my focus into building this community. Which is allowing us to do a lot more, including a new series of webinars in partnership with some of the most popular and innovative no-code tools, starting tomorrow. These will run every 2nd Thursday at 10am PST for all Pro members.

Here’s what we’ve got coming up…

- 24th March - Bubble responsiveness engine crash course - 7th April - Remix and Build a portfolio site with The.com using Blocks - 21st April - Learn how APIs work and how to make your own with Xano

As well as this, we have just released updated Pro memberships for all founders looking to grow their business using no-code tools. Pro membership includes…

- Full Slack access - Tutorials - Full access to Tools database - Perks - Attend Events - twice monthly - Full access to all data on NCF site

There's a lot more planned for the community this year, but this kicks off the next phase for NCF.
stories.title: NCF webinars and new Pro memberships
